abstract.t: This document describes how Token Binding can be used in the 0-RTT data of a TLS 1.3 connection. This involves defining a 0-RTT exporter for TLS 1.3, updating how Token Binding negotiation works, and adding a mechanism for indicating whether a server prevents replay. A TokenBindingMessage sent in 0-RTT data has different security properties than one sent after the TLS handshake has finished, which this document also describes.
